Text:
All these convenient "retirements" crack me up. Everyone is in duck-and-cover mode... and rightly so.

These people are going to be destroyed.
They certainly will be destroyed...I'm sure that the American people will see to it that the filth is disinfected.

Thank you Quazza, 
This was quick. 

Another example how competition makes it better for consumers :)-|-E

BTW,

My brain exploded today when I heard the lady crying about her lack of high-speed internet.

I actually had to turn off the show and walk away for a few minutes because I couldn't handle it.
quazza! how dare you! that was the funniest part of the show in the last month... i listened to it 3 times on my iPod

Pat cracked me up today... just hammering this woman at every opportunity.

Mocking people is perfectly acceptable as long as you're providing relevant arguments at the same time.
Oh it was funny...that's exactly why I had to walk away!

@unomyname  

and the competition is what exactly?
lack of high speed internet cannot compare to the lack of big screen flat tvs in EVERY room especially for those who carry forward a five digit balance on credit cards
